HOWTOPLAY_DESC:
Are you ready to reach the pinnacle in the field of digital entrepreneurship? 

 There are four stages you need to complete in your entrepreneurial journey. In each of these stages, you will answer seven questions and one bonus question.At the end of each stage, there is an informative video.

Complete all stages by answering the questions correctly and claim your spot at the top.

At the end of the game, you will also find a leaderboard where you can see your ranking among competitors.

Good luck!
BACKTOMAIN_DESC: Are you sure you want to go back to main menu?
QUESTION: Question
